Package pl.put.poznan.sortingmadness.logic

Interface Sorter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BubbleSorter, CocktailSorter, HeapSorter, InsertionSorter, MergeSorter, QuickSorter
    public interface Sorter
    Interface used for sorting lists of elements. Sorter strategy.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Mateusz Kolano

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Sorting 1D list of Comparable objects.

    • Method Detail

      • sort

        <E extends Comparable<E>> void sort​(List<E> unsorted_list,
                                    int max_it,
                                    boolean ascending)
        Sorting 1D list of Comparable objects.
        Type Parameters:
        E - self Comparable object.
        Parameters:
        unsorted_list - unsorted_list list of Comparable objects to be sorted.
        max_it - specifies maximum number of iterations for the cocktail sort (if max_it lesser than or equal to 0 then inf).
        ascending - specifies direction of sorting if true then ascending else false.

      • sort

        void sort​(List<org.json.JSONObject> unsorted_list,
          int max_it,
          boolean ascending,
          JSONComparator comparator)
        Sorting 1D list of JSONObjects.
        Parameters:
        unsorted_list - unsorted_list list of JSONObjects to be sorted.
        max_it - specifies maximum number of iterations for the cocktail sort (if max_it lesser than or equal to 0 then inf).
        ascending - specifies direction of sorting if true then ascending else false.
        comparator - comparator used for comparing of JSONObjects.
